content:
@Herko Coomans this looks like great news!

There's not a lot of detail in this article - does this program mandate full OpenNotes policies? Is it specific to hospitals or to all medical practices?

https://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/europe/dutch-minister-pledges-75-million-make-medical-data-available-patients-online
Is this an extension of VIPP? Very cool either way
